last_episode_to_air.name: And I, Don't Freakin' Think That Way
last_episode_to_air.overview: Steve Strope and the Pure Vision crew work on comedian Joe Rogan's '69 Nova. Simultaneously, Kelly works on a car that's been in his family for generations--his father's '32 Ford Coupe.

name: Hand Built Hot Rods
overview: Steve Strope and his team at Pure Vision put their design skills to the test on custom hot rods.
